message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175.  It's in great condition and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not able to go that low. How about $160?  I'm confident this product will be worth it for you.
Hi Alice, I understand that you're not willing to go as low as $145, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $152?
